1.word_problem: There are 4.0 walnut trees currently in the park. Park workers will plant 6.0 walnut trees today. How many walnut trees will the park have when the workers are finished?

2.word_problem: Dan found 56.0 seashells on the beach. He gave Jessica some of his seashells. He has 22.0 seashells left. How many seashells did he give to Jessica?
